sources.title: Hazal(1979)
sources.description: DISCRETION: I DO NOT CONDONE CHILD MARRIAGE! THIS FILM IS ABOUT ANCIENT TRADITIONS BEING CHALLENGED! Sorry for the lack of subs, I couldn't find a version with English subs. Hazal is married off to her late husband's brother in his early teens. As she develops a motherly affection for the child groom, she falls in love with mason Emin.

metadata.Plot: The son of a wealthy, respected family seeks the hand of Hazal; unexpectedly, soon after her marriage, her husband dies. According to custom, as the deceased family had paid dowry for Hazal, she must marry the next male sibling--which in this case, happens to be an 11-year old boy.
metadata.Actors: Türkan Soray, Talat Bulut, Harun Yesilyurt
